appDesc.message: Chrome Extension that allows you to send messages in bulk via WhatsAppâ„¢ Web

logTableTitle.description: Title of the send log table

numberLogTableTitle.description: Title of the number column of the send log table

messageLogTableTitle.description: Title of the message column of the send log table

attachmentLogTableTitle.description: Title of the attachment column of the send log table

datetimeLogTableTitle.description: Title of the date/time column of the send log table

importantNoteMessageButtonsForm.message: Important: The 'ID' type button may not work in all settings! Test before sending in bulk!
importantNoteMessageButtonsForm.description: Important note message from the button form

listTitleNoteMessageButtonsForm.message: You can create 3 types of buttons:
listTitleNoteMessageButtonsForm.description: List title note from the button form

firstListItemNoteMessageButtonsForm.description: First item from the list note of the button form

secondListItemNoteMessageButtonsForm.description: Second item from the list note of the button form

thirdListItemNoteMessageButtonsForm.message: $openTag$ID$closeTag$: Sends the text back to the sender.
thirdListItemNoteMessageButtonsForm.description: Third item from the list note of the button form

typeLabelMessageButtonsForm.description: Label of the type field of the button form

valueLabelMessageButtonsForm.description: Label of the content field of the button form

textLabelMessageButtonsForm.description: Label of the text field of the button form

urlTypeMessageButtonsForm.description: Value of the type field of the button form

phoneNumberTypeMessageButtonsForm.description: Value of the type field of the button form

idTypeMessageButtonsForm.description: Value of the type field of the button form

attachmentLabelMessageForm.description: Label of the attachment field of the message form

footerLabelMessageForm.message: If you wish to send only the attachment, keep the message field empty.
footerLabelMessageForm.description: Label of the footer field of the message form

footerSuggestionMessageForm.message: Suggestion: Send a message to your own number first to preview your message before sending it in bulk.
footerSuggestionMessageForm.description: Suggestion of the footer field of the message form

delayLabelMessageForm.description: Label of the interval field of the message form

countryCodePrefixMessageForm.message: Select a prefix to automatically add to the contact numbers:
countryCodePrefixMessageForm.description: Label of the country code prefix field of the message form

defaultLabelSelectCountryCode.description: Label of the default value of the country code

sendingMessagePopup.description: Title of the message sending popup

prefixFooterNotePopup.message: Don't forget to add the area code for each contact.

contactsPlaceholderPopup.message: Add the list of numbers for message sending, separated by commas or each number on a new line.
contactsPlaceholderPopup.description: Placeholder of the contacts field of the popup

messagePlaceholderPopup.description: Placeholder of the message field of the popup
